GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
powerpc/xive: Fix refcount leak in xive_get_max_prio

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 79b8eae24b7ee157bda07695d802be8576983fa8, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit eac1e731b59ee3b5f5e641a7765c7ed41ed26226. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: powerpc/xive: Fix refcount leak in xive_get_max_prio
